Feedback.DoYouHaveBugReportOrFeatureRequest: Do you have a bug to report or a feature request?
Feedback.HowToCreateTicket: Please read the recommendations on writing a good %1$sbug report%2$s or %3$sfeature request%4$s. Then register or login on %5$sour issue tracker%6$s and create a %7$snew issue%8$s.
Feedback.LearnWaysToParticipate: Learn about all the ways you can %1$s participate%2$s
Feedback.ManuallySendEmailTo: Please manually send your message to
Feedback.PluginDescription: Send your Feedback to the Matomo Team. Share your ideas and suggestions to make Matomo the best analytics platform in the world!
Feedback.PrivacyClaim: Matomo respects your %1$sprivacy%2$s and gives you full control over your data.
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageDislike: We are sorry to hear you don't like it! Please let us know how we can improve.
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageLike: We are glad you like it! Please let us know what you like the most or if you have a feature request.
Feedback.RateFeatureSendFeedbackInformation: Your Matomo platform will send us (the Matomo team) an email (including your email address) so we can get in contact with you if you have any question.
Feedback.RateFeatureTitle: Do you like the '%s' feature? Please rate and leave a comment
Feedback.ThankYou: Thank you for helping us to make Matomo better!
Feedback.TopLinkTooltip: Tell us what you think, or request Professional Support.
Feedback.ViewUserGuides: Learn how to configure Matomo and how to effectively analyze your data with our %1$suser guides%2$s
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesIntro: With a Matomo On-Premise Support Subscription, let our experienced team assist you online in utilising Matomo Analytics to grow your business.
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesOfferIntro: What services can you benefit from?
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesDedicatedSupport: Support from a dedicated Matomo team member every step of the way
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesOnboarding: Onboarding questionnaire and meeting with a Matomo Support member
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesTraining: Exclusive access to Matomo training videos
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesEmailAlerts: Email alerts for security releases for Matomo
Feedback.VisitTheForums: Visit the %1$s Forums%2$s and get help from the community of Matomo users
Feedback.PleaseLeaveExternalReviewForMatomo: Share your thoughts on one of these sites and inspire others to join our data revolution.
Feedback.TrackMultipleSites: I need to track multiple sites or subdomains
Feedback.RemoveOtherLabel: I want to see my 'Others' data
Feedback.PurgeOldData: I want to remove some old data
